title: Pie and Ale
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Mediterranean, Beer/Wine, British, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Bakerie company opened Pie & Ale in late-2011. Has fresh bread with vegan suitable choices like tomato mixed beans, roast vegetables, falafel, garlic mushroom, Bombay potatoes, and stuffed vine leaves, which are tagged as vegan on the menu. Vegan wine is marked on the wine card. Good atmosphere.
